successes.title: New Studio Album from Toad the Wet Sprocket!
successes.description: TTWS is releasing their first album in 16 years, New Constellation and we want you to be a part of it!

Pledges.description: Digital Download "Single" of title track New Constellation, from new studio album New Constellation, plus a virtual "high 5" from Toad.

Kickstarter Exclusive Album Release Show in Los Angeles! (Estimated August 2013). Come see us at our special New Constellation album release show!  All travel, accommodations is on you, but we will provide: Ticket to special concert event. Toad the Wet Sprocket Pre-Show Party - with the band - come hang with us for a special album release celebration, take as many photos as you want, we'll sign your Toad collectibles, etc. Special viewing area for show. Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Kickstarter Exclusive Album Release Show in the CITY OF YOUR CHOICE! (must coincide with an upcoming tour date). You and a guest will get tickets and special access to a show of your choosing! All travel, accommodations is on you, but we will provide: Two tickets to the show. Toad the Wet Sprocket Pre-Show Party - with the band - come hang with us before the show, take as many photos as you want, we'll sign your Toad collectibles, etc. Special viewing area for show. Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded

*** BEST GIFT FOR ANY TOAD FAN (OR YOURSELF) *** Handwritten, signed lyrics for ANY Toad the Wet Sprocket song you wish- we'll sign it/dedicate it to anyone you'd like. Limited Edition / signed / numbered screenprint Toad New Constellation poster. Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Limited Edition New Constellation 12" Vinyl. Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded

Toad the Wet Sprocket "Lesson or "hang" of your choice"/Show Package - you and a friend will join Toad at the show of your choice (all travel, accommodations are on you, but we will provide the below.  Show must be prior to January 2014): Always wanted to learn how to write a song, learn to play guitar, bass or drums?  We'll this is your chance to learn from a member of the band... As part of this package you will have a 1 hour session for the "Class" of your choice with one band member to take place right after soundcheck/before the show.  Your friend can take as many pics as they want and we'll share your favorite one on our social media sites.  Learn how to write a song from Glen, or learn how to play guitar from Todd, or learn how to play drums from Randy or learn bass from Dean - the choice is yours! VIP tickets and Pre-Show "hang" passes - you show up, we'll provide the party, you can hang for soundcheck. Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded

*** BEST "ULTIMATE TOAD FAN" PACKAGE! ***
Toad the Wet Sprocket Tour Package - you and 3 friends will join Toad at the show of your choice (all travel, accommodations are on you, but we will provide the below.  Show must be prior to January 2014): 4 VIP tickets and Pre-Show "hang" passes - you show up, we'll provide the party, you can hang for soundcheck. Personal "thank you" from stage - 1 Lucky person from your group can participate on stage and ring the infamous "cowbell" during "Come Down" in our set - Any photos/video your friends take of you on stage will be shared on our Toad social media pages post-show with a personal "thank you". Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded. Limited Edition New Constellation 12" Vinyl

You will attend the show of your choice, all travel, accommodations is on you, but you will be able to perform a few Toad songs of your choice with the band during soundcheck. Take as many photos and/or video as you like and we'll sign your Toad collectibles etc. You will also receive - Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded

Toad the Wet Sprocket will bring the party to YOU!!!   Well virtually anyhow - Live, acoustic, full-band performance just for you for a LIVE, One (1) Hour via Skype. Photos from our virtual concert just for you and your friends will be shared on our social media sites with a personal "thank you". Toad the Wet Sprocket VIP "Care Package" including: Limited Edition New Constellation T-Shirt (designed exclusively and only available through Kickstarter Campaign). Limited Edition New Constellation 12" Vinyl. Limited Edition / signed / numbered screenprint Toad New Constellation poster. Signed Kickstarter limited edition of new studio album New Constellation on CD (with special packaging plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks (from the New Constellation recording sessions). Limited Edition Toad "postcard"/sticker set (4 postcards). Advance Digital Download of new studio album New Constellation (with 96k option), plus FOUR (4) bonus tracks and special extras (from the New Constellation recording sessions) - 1 Week Before Album Release or when the project is 100% funded

(Continental US only / buyer responsible for covering all band travel & production costs TBD) - We are happy to try work around existing tour dates / Concert must be before January 2014.
Toad the Wet Sprocket will bring the party to YOU!!!   Live, acoustic, full-band performance just for you for a LIVE, One (1) hour set in your backyard, living room, etc.. (we'll bring our instruments, you provide the space, production, travel costs and audience) Photos from event will be shared on our social media sites with a personal "thank you".
